nodes.documentation:
@title MatryxRound - A round within a Matryx tournament.
 @author Max Howard - <max@nanome.ai>, Sam Hessenauer - <sam@nanome.ai>
nodes.name: MatryxRound

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that this round is in the open submission state.
nodes.name: duringOpenRound

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that this round is in the winner selection state.
nodes.name: duringReviewPeriod

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires that the desired submission is accessible to the requester.
nodes.name: submissionExists

nodes.documentation: @dev Requires the function caller to be the platform or the owner of this tournament
nodes.name: addBounty
setContractAddress
getContractAddress

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,struct LibConstruction.RoundData storage pointer,struct LibRound.SelectWinnersData storage pointer,struct LibRound.SubmissionsData storage pointer) returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns all submissions made to this round.
 @return _submissions All submissions made to this round.
nodes.name: getSubmissions
getBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns whether or not a winning submission has been chosen.
 @return Whether or not a submission has been chosen.
nodes.name: submissionsChosen

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the index of this round's winning submission.
 @return Index of the winning submission.
nodes.name: getWinningSubmissionAddresses

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of submissions made to this round.
 @return Number of submissions made to this round.
nodes.name: numberOfSubmissions

nodes.documentation: @dev Starts the round (callable only by the owner of the round).
nodes.name: scheduleStart

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibConstruction.RoundData storage pointer,uint256,struct LibConstruction.RoundData memory)

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the tournament to edit the
nodes.name: editRound

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct LibConstruction.RoundData storage pointer,struct LibRound.SelectWinnersData storage pointer,struct LibRound.SelectWinnersData memory,struct LibConstruction.RoundData memory)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Choose a winning submission for the round (callable only by the owner of the round).
 @param _selectWinnersData Data containing:
   winningSubmissions: Addresses of the winning submissions
   rewardDistribution: Distribution indicating how to split the MTX reward among the submissions
   rewardDistributionTotal: (Unused)
 @param _roundData Data containing:
   start: Start time (seconds since unix-epoch) for next round
   end: End time (seconds since unix-epoch) for next round
   reviewPeriodDuration: Number of seconds to allow for winning submissions to be selected in next round
   bounty: Bounty in MTX for next round
   closed: (Unused)
nodes.name: selectWinningSubmissions

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows contributors to withdraw a portion of the round bounty if the round has been abandoned.
nodes.name: transferBountyToTournament
createSubmission
